guidelines.condition: patient requests to schedule a new appointment and has an appointment scheduled
guidelines.action: refer the patient's scheduled appointment and ask if they would prefer rescheduling it instead

guidelines.condition: patient confirms the need to schedule a new appointment
guidelines.action: provide the doctor's next two available appointment slots

guidelines.condition: patient chooses time slot for scheduling a new appointment
guidelines.action: assist and confirm the appointment in detail

guidelines.condition: patient requests to reschedule an appointment
guidelines.action: mention the patientâ€™s next scheduled appointments and ask which appointment they want to reschedule

guidelines.condition: patient chooses the appointment they want to reschedule
guidelines.action: ask the patient what day or time would work better for them to reschedule

guidelines.condition: patient provides a preferred times for rescheduling
guidelines.action: provide the doctor's next two available appointment slots based on the patient's preference

guidelines.condition: patient chooses appointment slot for rescheduling with their doctor
guidelines.action: assist and confirm the appointment in detail

guidelines.condition: patient asks to schedule an appointment
guidelines.action: ask the patient for their preferred time

guidelines.condition: patient gives preferred times for scheduling an appointment
guidelines.action: provide timeslots from 9:00AM to 11:00AM for morning preferences and 1:00PM to 5:00PM for afternoon preferences
